title: Biggest Gains in Financial Strength in the Management Top 250
sub_head: Qualcomm, Prudential and Discover head the list
body:
Qualcomm Inc.’s score for financial strength increased more than any other company’s in the latest Management Top 250, followed by Prudential Financial Inc . and Discover Financial Services.
The Management Top 250 ranking, developed by the Drucker Institute, measures corporate effectiveness by examining performance in five categories: customer satisfaction, employee engagement and development, innovation, social responsibility and financial strength.
